QuestData.Title: The Fall of Corlain
QuestData.Description:
<This discarded journal looks like it belonged to one of the residents of upper Corlain. Within it details some early signs of the Heartsbane's appearance in Corlain.
If you can find more writings like this, you might be able to piece together the events that led to Corlain's current state.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine $1oa Corlain Citizen's Journals in Upper Corlain.
QuestData.RewardText:
This tale... such a tragic fate to befall my home...
We must make this right, $c! For the people of Corlain and all of Drustvar!
